 void shouldHonorOAuthPercentEncodingRules()
          OAuth percent encoding demands characters from the URI reserved set to be percent encoded, and characters from the unreserved to NOT be percent encoded.

Method Detail

shouldHonorOAuthPercentEncodingRules

public void shouldHonorOAuthPercentEncodingRules()
OAuth percent encoding demands characters from the URI reserved set to be percent encoded, and characters from the unreserved to NOT be percent encoded. All characters must be UTF-8 encoded first.
